hero.subtitle: Computer Science Engineer and software developer.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am Christian Rangel, a Computer Science Engineer who led Astroapp, a mobile application developed from design to deployment, satisfying all of the client's needs.
about.p2: I aim to design robust projects that combine innovation and empathy, offering pocket-friendly solutions and applying artificial intelligence to improve user experience.

job1.description: Responsible for designing and developing mobile applications with Dart/Flutter, managing and optimizing databases in Firebase. I also developed APIs for efficient communication between the frontend and backend.

job2.description: Developed backend functionalities with Python and implemented resource management in AWS to ensure procedural continuity. Managed tickets in Jira for task tracking and used Git and Bitbucket for version control.

job3.description: Led the optimization and deployment of the website and mobile application. Developed backend functionalities in Python and Flutter, and managed the application's database using PostgreSQL and Firebase.

job4.description: Performed data cleaning using Office and Python tools, processing information obtained through Web Scraping techniques to ensure data quality and accuracy.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: Do you have an interesting project or just want to say hello? Send me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
